availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Boyd (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of James Boyd and Serem Sharp Boyd. Boarder in the household of George Dodson in Ohio County in 1860. Farmer in Ohio County in 1863. Served in the 12th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant from October 8, 1862, to March 3, 1863. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from April 12, 1865, to September 20, 1865.
